io.spine.server.storage

Interface StorageFactory

  • All Superinterfaces:
    java.lang.AutoCloseable
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    InMemoryStorageFactory

    public interface StorageFactory
extends java.lang.AutoCloseable
    A factory for creating storages used by repositories EventStore and Stand.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods Default Methods

    • Method Detail

      • createAggregateStorage

        <I> AggregateStorage<I> createAggregateStorage(ContextSpec context,
                                               java.lang.Class<? extends Aggregate<I,?,?>> aggregateClass)
        Creates a new AggregateStorage.
        Type Parameters:
        I - the type of aggregate IDs
        Parameters:
        context - specification of the Bounded Context AggregateRepository of which requests the creation of the storage
        aggregateClass - the class of Aggregates to be stored

      • createRecordStorage

        <I> RecordStorage<I> createRecordStorage(ContextSpec context,
                                         java.lang.Class<? extends Entity<I,?>> entityClass)
        Creates a new RecordStorage.
        Type Parameters:
        I - the type of entity IDs
        Parameters:
        context - specification of the Bounded Context RecordBasedRepository of which requests the creation of the storage
        entityClass - the class of entities to be stored

      • createProjectionStorage

        <I> ProjectionStorage<I> createProjectionStorage(ContextSpec context,
                                                 java.lang.Class<? extends Projection<I,?,?>> projectionClass)
        Creates a new ProjectionStorage.
        Type Parameters:
        I - the type of stream projection IDs
        Parameters:
        context - specification of the Bounded Context ProjectionRepository of which requests the creation of the storage
        projectionClass - the class of Projections to be stored

      • createInboxStorage

        InboxStorage createInboxStorage(boolean multitenant)
        Creates a new InboxStorage.

        The instance of InboxStorage is used in the Delivery operations. Therefore there is typically just a single instance of InboxStorage per ServerEnvironment instance, unlike other Storage types which instances are created per-BoundedContext.

        Parameters:
        multitenant - whether the created storage should be multi-tenant

      • createCatchUpStorage

        CatchUpStorage createCatchUpStorage(boolean multitenant)
        Creates a new CatchUpStorage.

        Similar to InboxStorage, this type of storage is also used in the Delivery routines. So by default there is a single instance of CatchUpStorage per ServerEnvironment.

        Parameters:
        multitenant - whether the created storage should be multi-tenant

      • createEventStore

        default EventStore createEventStore(ContextSpec context)
        Creates a new EventStore.
        Parameters:
        context - specification of the Bounded Context events of which the store would serve
